name: calculate_internal_rate_of_return
description: Calculates the Internal Rate of Return (IRR) for a series of cash flows. The IRR is a financial metric used to estimate the profitability of potential investments. It is the discount rate that makes the net present value (NPV) of all cash flows from a particular project equal to zero.

cash_flows.description: A list of cash flows (can be negative for outflows and positive for inflows).
